Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand lost their most recent match against Pakistan despite scoring 401 runs.
Sri Lanka played Bangladesh in their last match and lost, but there was a great deal of drama.
New Zealand vs Sri Lanka, ICC Men's ODI World Cup 2023, 41st Match will be held on Thursday, November 09, 2023, at M.Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru.
The pitch in Bengaluru averages around 320 runs in the first innings, suggesting hitters will have the upper hand.
